name: Super Pixel Pinball
description:
Super Pixel Pinball! Experience a retro-arcade experience, designed from the ground up!

An interesting mixture of skill and patience, 3 types of power-ups, 3 distinct bosses, and 3 chapters consisting of 30 varied levels!

A single run currently lasts about 1-2 hours, depending on your chosen diffuculty!

There are additional chapters, and an endless mode being planned, and will be created, and added in future updates, if we reach enough support!

The game does not require an internet connection (It's fully offline!), and there are NO ads, and never will be.

If you have suggestions for future updates, or find a bug, please send me and e-mail about it, and attach a screenshot, if you can!

And now go, and save Earth from its impending Doom! We are counting on you, captain!

-----------------------------

Find neccesary attributions to licensed content in the YT trailer description, and in-game, under the 'Credits' sub-menu!
